 DzPushModifier (const DzInFile *file)

Detailed Description

A displacement map for a mesh. Otherwise known as a push target.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzPushModifier::DzPushModifier (  ) 

Default Constructor. Creates a new push. The push will create its own empty deltas.

DzPushModifier::~DzPushModifier (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzPushModifier::DzPushModifier ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [protected]

For internal use only.

This constructor is called by the Framework when loading from a file so that certain initializations can be skipped that will happen later in the file load process.

Parameters:
file The file from which this object was loaded.
